title: Help the Hag Survivors
content:
Help the Hag Survivors Type Quest Act Act 3 Location Old Galow's Place Reward Fey Semblance Amulet Ring of Feywild Sparks

Help the Hag Survivors

Fey Semblance Amulet

Ring of Feywild Sparks

Help the Hag Survivors is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Help the Hag Survivors can be acquired during Act 3. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earning more loot and experience to become more powerful.

Help the Hag Survivors Objective
